message.body: I heard from mom that you have a show in NJ opening this weekend.
Yeah in Asbury park. Too bad I hate the boss
I've gotta uhaul a bunch of work there tomorrow
Yeah. Asbury Park is supposed to be a nicer shore town.
Cool. I don't have any Saturday plans, should I try to make the opening?
Well you could catch a ride with me if u actually want to go
But it seems like it would be a big to do for u
I'd probably use it as an excuse to stay in Manhattan for the weekend and just come down for the day.
Ok would u be able to get there,
Yeah, it'd be around 1.5 hours from Penn Station on NJTransit, plus about a .7 mile walk from the station. I'll explore a bit. What time(s) is (are) the
I'll have to get back to u
